reviews.customers_say: Customers find this cardigan to be a great quality piece with a close-knit material that's not flimsy or light, and appreciate its versatility for both casual and dressy occasions. They like its color options, with one customer specifically praising the solid black version, and one noting it's perfect for desert winters. The fit and sizing receive mixed feedback - while some say it fits nicely, others mention it runs

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Classy and Casual. Great Quality!
items.body: I read the reviews carefully before purchasing and while reviews were mixed, the majority were positive so I took a chance and ordered it. This is an absolute winner! The cardigan is great quality and looks much more expensive than I paid for it. It has a good weight to it, leaning more towards the heavier side which helps it not look/feel cheap. Very versatile - looks great with a pair of jeans and just as great with a nice dress and heels. Very pleased with this purchase. Read more
items.author: J

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent quality
items.body: This is my third ‚Äúcoatigan‚Äù love the quality, the look and how comfortable the material is. It‚Äôs not as thick as a coat, but heavier than a typical cardigan sweater.. it looks great with Fall dresses and pairs well with pants and jeans for a ‚Äúpolished look.‚Äù For reference I‚Äôm 5‚Äù6, 162lbs. I purchased the XL and the length hits 2-3 inches below my knees. Read more
items.author: byron hebert

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Sooo nice
items.body: I just received mine üòç It is very nice quality and construction. It has a good amount of structure and weight and is a thick, close-knit material that has plenty of give to move freely. Fits very well. Not quite enough fabric to pull it closed, but it looks quite nice worn open which gives a long, vertical line. I'm 5'5" 155lbs 36DD athletic build with broad shoulders, long arms and I ordered a Large. I think I would be swimming if I sized up. I ordered the brown- I was really hoping it was a cool brown for my color palette, but it is a warm brown ü§é It's close enough to work for me. I will be ordering in other colors. I haven't worn or washed it yet. I'm really hoping it holds up, but that's the trade-off with knits so we'll see. I plan to wear it around the house or running errands to feel comfy and chic. I would even wear it to work or for an interview. It's that nice! If you want to do the elevated classic trend like blazers or long coats- but still be cozy- this is it! Read more
items.author: Jackie Woodyer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Get this!
items.body: I love these. Purchased last year and started wearing this year, have received multiple compliments and inquiries. Have the gray (which is more of a light tan) and the army green. Excellent, thick quality. Not heavy, but solid. Normally wear a small/medium but have these in XS for semi-fitted look, not tight at all. Would size down! I‚Äôm 5-4, 135lbs. Read more
items.author: vicky

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Named Grey, But Lt. Taupe, Good Quality
items.body: Heavy Material. Looks like an Open Coat w/ The Collar. I Love the 2 Front Pockets. It is Lt. Taupe like the photo, not Grey as it is named. Worth thr Price for Quality. May buy again for another color.üòÉ Read more
items.author: Karen H.

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Very good quality
items.body: This is a thick and substantial cardigan. It looks and feels expensive and has some weight to it. Its beautiful. Its classy. Its stylish. I got the khaki and black and the grey. However, the grey is shorter. The collar is smaller in width and almost looks like a different style. So its not consistent. Quality control lacking but its still worth trying out because the quality of the actual material is great. The grey one was also previously tried on heavily or worn. It was thrown in an insert bag and sent to me like that. No outer package on this color. Disappointed because I gotta return it. Read more
items.author: AmazonReviewer99

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars A must have for fall !
items.body: Love this so much ! You won‚Äôt be disappointed. This is not like a sweater cardigan, it holds up like a trench coat but soft and so comfortable. I normally wear small and ordered small. Read more
items.author: Bev C

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Just like expensive Banana Republic sweater blazer
items.body: I am absolutely in love with this ANRABESS Women Cardigan Sweater Blazer! It‚Äôs incredibly similar to a more expensive version I bought from Banana Republic, which used to be my favorite cardigan‚Äîuntil now. This one has the same cozy, slightly oversized fit with a relaxed, stylish vibe. The notch lapels and open front give it a polished look that‚Äôs perfect for everything from casual days out to layering over office outfits. The quality of the knit is fantastic, and the fabric is super soft and warm, making it perfect for the fall and winter seasons. I loved it so much that I immediately bought another one in a different color! I can already tell this is going to be my go-to cardigan this season. Highly recommend! Read more
items.author: Jazzy Reviews

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.
about_this_item:

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.
long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Sky, Gray, Deep Green, Apricot, Army Green, Black, Deep Apricot, Coffee, Light Blue, Olive, Khaki, Red Apricot, Cream White, Caramel. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
